packaging-format.description: The packaging format of the current object version, as defined in the packaging-format-registry extension.

dataset-version.description: The version of the dataset that this object version is an export of, as defined by the depositor.

deaccessioned.description: If present, this version of the object has been deaccessioned and should not be disseminated.

datetime.description: The timestamp when the deaccessioning of the object version was registered in the OCFL repository. If not present, unknown.
datetime.constraints: a datetime in ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDTHH-mm-ss format

reason.description: The reason why this object version has been deaccessioned.
